summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to the defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell, informing them that an additional discovery production is ready and will be sent via USAfx and on a CD to Maxwell at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center).

events.title: Discovery Production Notification
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office notifies Maxwell's defense counsel that an additional discovery production is ready and will be delivered via USAfx and on a CD to Maxwell at the MDC.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 8, 2021, regarding the ongoing criminal case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The U.S. Attorney's Office is providing additional discovery to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team, which includes attorneys Mark S. Cohen, Bobbi Sternheim, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The discovery will be sent electronically via USAfx and on a physical CD to Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
The correspondence indicates the procedural phase of evidence sharing between prosecution and defense in Maxwell's trial.
